attributes.action: Invesitgate the Banks Riping off the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Investigate Charges made by banks for unauthorised overdrafts, you know this is illegal but yet the government do nothing. The government need to start looking after it people, not bowing to the whims of companies. Investigate and stop the banks from ripping off your people

rejection.details:
There are already a few petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=bank+charges
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
